Prep k3 data

```{r}

# get neuron summary from k3
newk_value_from_dfresult <- function(df,  operator = c("mean", "median")){
  if(operator == "mean"){
      result <- apply(df, 1, function(ri){
        mean(c(as.numeric(ri)))
      }) |> unlist()
    } else if(operator=="median"){
      result <- apply(df, 1, function(ri){
        median(c(as.numeric(ri)))
      }) |> unlist()
    } else{
      stop("didn't recognize operator")
    }
  return(result)
}
# cohort1
dfp.tall.c1.k3$neuron.true <- 
  newk_value_from_dfresult(dfp.tall.c1.k3[,c("Excit.true", "Inhib.true")], "mean")
dfp.tall.c1.k3$neuron.pred <- 
  newk_value_from_dfresult(dfp.tall.c1.k3[,c("Excit.pred", "Inhib.pred")], "mean")
dfp.tall.c1.k3$neuron.abs.error <- 
  newk_value_from_dfresult(dfp.tall.c1.k3[,c("Excit.abs.error", "Inhib.abs.error")], "mean")
```

Save multipanel

```{r}
plot1 <- scatter.c1.k2.no + ggtitle("K2\nCohort1 Neuron")
plot2 <- scatter.c1.k2.yes
plot3 <- jbp.c1.k2
plot4 <- scatter.c2.k2.no + ggtitle("Cohort2 Neuron")
plot5 <- scatter.c2.k2.yes
plot6 <- jbp.c2.k2

plot7 <- scatter.c1.k3.no + ggtitle("K3\nCohort1 Neuron")
plot8 <- scatter.c1.k3.yes
plot9 <- jbp.c1.k3
plot10 <- scatter.c2.k3.no + ggtitle("Cohort2 Neuron")
plot11 <- scatter.c2.k3.yes
plot12 <- jbp.c2.k3

# save
jpeg("./figures/01_multipanel/multi-pb_k2-k3_cohort-1-2.jpg",
     width = 10, height = 20, units = "in", res = 400)
grid.arrange(plot1, plot2, plot3, plot4, plot5, plot6, 
             plot7, plot8, plot9, plot10, plot11, plot12,
             layout_matrix = matrix(seq(12), ncol = 2))
dev.off()
```
